      • getQuotaHistory

        @API
public ListResponse<QuotaHistory> getQuotaHistory(@Nullable
                                                        ServicePackageQuotaListOptions options)
                                                 throws MbedCloudException
        Gets quota usage history.

        This API is available for commercial accounts. Aggregator accounts can see their own and subtenant's quota usage data. History data is ordered in ascending order based on the time of their addition.

        Parameters:
        options - filter options
        Returns:
        quota history
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during request processing.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        downloaded file if there is a report. Null otherwise.

                                                 throws MbedCloudException

        Parameters:
        month - month for which the report is requested. If null, the current month will be considered. It must be either an RFC3339 date/time string or following the format: YYYY-MM
        filePath - path of the destination file. If null, a temporary file will be created.
        Returns:
        downloaded file if there is a report. Null otherwise.
